First of all the location is the plus of this restaurant. Nothing special just regular taste. The whole menu made up with regular things like others. I found only couple of things special is chop cheese hero and mixed platter. The taste is different than other‚Äôs gourmet burger. The cheese burger taste is regular. Mix platter is awesome. Sitting space is very congested. It would best if you order and take out the food. Customer service needs to be improved little bit. Getting parking there is impossible. Overall a great place. Will definitely check back later.
Platters are over- salty
Goodbye by
The food is great , I loved the fried fish and the lamb gyros especially . The atmosphere is nice and cozy as well.
very very good
Very nice to the customer
Great service and nice atmosphere
I found this place Driving around but this place is delicious, platters with fries in it üî•üî•the guy at the counter was very nice.

Moved to Elmhurst in August and this one my first ever Halal experience and they put me on to Halal. I‚Äôm a believer. I always go back to this spot it‚Äôs consistent and quality is pretty top notch imo. The salad is super fresh and they Give generous portions. but the plates are well worth $13.
Damn good Chapli kebab. Also open all night which is great for late night munchies

The Manager, Mr. Jimmy was absolutely the best, I have been ordering from this place for almost a year now, Jimmy never stop short of making sure my experience in this establishment is less than superb, I would recommend this restaurant over any other.  To the Owner Jimmy is the heart of this business, the way he greet and attend to all the customers that walks in.  He deserves a raise, Thank You Jimmy
Best fish platter hands down ! Their fries were fresh hand cut loved it.
Food is so good
I enjoyed the dish, and it‚Äôs very convenient that the place operates until 5 a.m.
Best halal spot in queens
Really really great food! Gyros were amazing. Naqib and Sameeha were great servers too.
I loved the lamb gyroo, one of the best in nyc
Amazing food and good customer service

The manager is the most disrespectful ever, be beware! the food is delicious and the employees are friendly. But be careful with manager because he is always angry and yelling to employees while they‚Äôre cooking your food.
Great place to eat and get food
They are very good. Foods are very tasty.
Yamme food.

I needed two orders to be packaged a certain way for travel directly to Florida. The guy who answered assured me that he would execute as instructed with the friendliest attitude. My son received his favorite halal food EVER this evening and can‚Äôt stop thanking me. Thank you and I‚Äôll be picking up another order for him next month!
Yh banging food
Idk what these other reviewers are smoking to rate this place so highly, but don‚Äôt believe them lol. Waste of money, bad service and mediocre food.

I had a wonderful experience dining at halal eats restauran From the moment I walked in, the staff made me feel welcome with their warm hospitality and attentive service. The atmosphere was cozy, clean, and inviting‚Äîperfect for both casual meals and special occasions.

The food was absolutely delicious! Every dish was full of flavor, beautifully presented, and made with fresh ingredients. I especially loved how well-balanced the spices and seasonings were, showing the chef‚Äôs great attention to detail. The portions were generous and definitely worth the price.

Overall, this restaurant exceeded my expectations. If you‚Äôre looking for a place with amazing food, excellent service, and a pleasant ambiance, I highly recommend it. I will definitely be coming back again!
Always hooks it up, large portions, tastes great, quick and a must if you want some good halal food!!! We come here at least once a week!
I love the food here !!
Best chop cheese i‚Äôve ever had
Great menu, clean place and open late.
Great chicken and lamb platter
THE FOOD IS INCREDIBLE
Omggggg thissss issss sooo gooddd
Sturdy good
Service here is great and they give you large portions

Best Halal Food and best Halal spot EVER! I always look forward to coming here all the way from Miami. The food and service is always top notch! Thanks guys for your awesome service and I'll see ya'll next time I'm in town
the workers are so disrespectful

Honestly, an amazing restaurant with a great team very helpful so nice clean and very reasonable price. Please keep it up all the time like this. I wish you all the best of course I‚Äôll come every time when I get a chance your food is so delicious. Thank you all
The best combo over rice in the town üòã
they best food . Excellent service from sunny!
Great food and amazing sauce and service
Its good test
The Bible says not to eat foods offered to other gods.
Very delicious foods and nice customer service
Great service, great food. Best in Queens.
This is the best halal food I have ever had. They offer a variety of halal combinations.

Very cool setting, and excellent customer service‚Ä¶ GRILLED CHICKEN SANDWICH Was very juicy and tasted excellent!

White sauce is delicious you can taste the lemon zest in it. will be back for more Bhai Naqib‚Ä¶ coming back for rice and grilled chicken breast cut up with it and white sauce platter.

Unsuspecting from the outside food is üí£üí£ walahi ‚Ä¶

Seasoned fries are a hit also

Make sure to get extra white sauce‚Ä¶ for your Fries.

It‚Äôs a busy area and parking is rough, but don‚Äôt let that stop you call and place your order ahead.

I spoke to brother naquib or naqib yesterday afternoon I had to commend him on the flavorful grilled sandwich and told him what I thought of the food and how I wish they would open a spot in rockaway south ozone park. He told me they have a food joint in new Hyde park or they are opening one this month over there. Insha Allah they open one in rockaway area Good Halal food is hard to find and get. So glad i went in to here and tried the food for the first time.

Alhamdulillah

The store itself may be a bit on the smaller side, but honestly, that doesn‚Äôt matter one bit once you experience the food and the service. In fact, the cozy space almost adds to the charm  it feels warm, inviting, and personal, like a place where you‚Äôre more than just another customer.

The food here is absolutely to die for. Every dish I‚Äôve tried has been fresh, flavorful, and prepared with obvious care, but my go-to order is always the lamb gyro. It‚Äôs consistently delicious  perfectly seasoned, incredibly juicy, and bursting with flavor in every bite. The meat is tender and cooked just right, the bread is warm and soft, and the toppings and sauces tie everything together beautifully. It‚Äôs the kind of food that keeps you thinking about it long after you‚Äôve left.

One thing I really appreciate is the staff. From the moment you walk in, you‚Äôre met with genuine smiles and a warm welcome. They don‚Äôt just take your order  they take the time to make sure you‚Äôre comfortable, answer any questions, and ensure you leave happy. I‚Äôve been here multiple times, and without fail, the atmosphere has been friendly and inviting. You can tell they truly care about their customers, which makes the experience even better.

If you‚Äôre a fan of halal food  or even if you‚Äôve never tried it before  I cannot recommend this place enough. It‚Äôs a must-visit spot that delivers both on quality and value. For the best deal, stop by during lunchtime when they have specials that make the experience even sweeter. Between the amazing flavors, the welcoming environment, and the great prices, this is easily one of my favorite places to eat. You won‚Äôt regret checking it out!
Muy bueno todo

Delicious food and fresh ingredients! Got the mix over rice. Some of the best I've ever had. Every part is very flavorful. Huge portions and you get lots of everything not just a big pile of rice. Easily enough for 2 people. Made very quickly too.

So before you start saying oh just another Halal Spot, this place has over 1600 Google reviews with the 4.8 average definitely stands out from the rest of them. The food quality and customer here is just different! They‚Äôre open daily till 4 AM.

üö® They‚Äôve got pound 4 pound the best chai in New York. Yes, you heard what we said give it a try and let us know what you think! üö®

We get food here every week and it never disappoints! The food is so flavorful and the portions are extremely generous. The staff is friendly and very welcoming. I would highly recommend this to anyone around the area, especially for those looking for a quick bite!

Ordered online and this is what came. It was supposed to be mix over rice but this is all. Barely any meat paid $14 for this. Also selected double fries and they just threw in 4-5 soggy fries. I ordered 2 platters 1 chicken that one had a bit more meat so they definitely did it wrong. Also asked for light rice on one both had the same amount of rice. They don‚Äôt even read instructions before they gave me same amount of meat on both when I paid extra $3 to get one extra meat.

Customer service is the beginning of any sale, and so it's good when a customer comes to a business and they're greeted nicely. Halal Eats, has this down and I was happy to spend money with them.

I ordered the chicken platter with rice french fries white sauce with salad. It looks good tastes good, and there was enough for two meals. I ate some them and saved the rest for later.

Since 1990 I haven't eaten pork, beef or any other red meat. It wasn't until around 1998 when I started eating poultry and fish again. Being a person who is sort of a naturopathic practitioner I'm concerned about eating clean. I've always been interested in trying out a Halal eatery, and so I decided to try Halal Eats in Elmhurst (Queens) NY. These days I'm striving to eat more fruits and vegetables than anything but now I know a go to spot when I'm in the area. On top of this the platter was under $15. In NYC to get a healthy meal, poultry, grains and salad This Was a Big Deal. I appreciated the hospitality and the good food. Just walking in the place looks like any other NYC fast food spot with a little area to eat. But the customer service and food is top notch. Stop through and get a good meal for a great price. 5 stars all the way.
#halalfood #foodreviews #queenstakeouts #queensny #restaurantreviews #theroneshellmanmedia
Very good halal food. They don‚Äôt charge for extra toppings (in my experience). Their hot sauce has a kick to it. The food is well seasoned and fresh. Great customer service
great food and great service. asked for extra white sauce and the guy at the front added extra tho the order was done and gave me an extra side of sauce.

FOOD IS AMAZING!!!! Halal eats is the best! They got my order done quick, it was beautifully packed and they stuffed it too! It‚Äôs worth the price. Staff is kind and respectful and the food was delicious!!!!  I am definitely going back. I wish I had eaten the food as soon as I got it, but I had to wait 2 hours and then I took the picture and it was still delicious! Portion size is more than enough for 1 person. I had leftovers and when I re-heated it was still good!! I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS PLACE!!!! 10/10!!!

This was my first visit and I called in my order for pickup,I go insideand was greeted with a smile  and very professional staff,I loved everything so far. When I arrived home I was impressed by the presentation,it looked like they took care in how the food looked, which was very good. I took one bite of the rice very flavorful and the lamb was on point everything was fresh and I can't say enough about this place you must try it IMO they are top notch!!!I'd recommend anyone to try it this is my spot for Hala food.

The purpose of this review is not to hate or harm this restaurant in any way, shape, or form. That being said, I hope you take this review as an informative review.

Atmosphere: After reading the positive reviews, I've had to come to this place and see it for myself. This is quite a small place, with only four tables around and a wall mounted table. I went there after busy times and all the tables were occupied, even people that have finished their food took their sweet time to leave. A food distributor came at the same time. It was a bit uncomfortable to move around.

Service: To be honest, service was average. The lady said my order was going to be ready in 10 minutes and it took them almost 20 minutes.

Food: I had hopes for the food to be the best part of everything. However, it came out to be average as well, not bad nor delicious. I ordered the Fish Platter and the Crispy Chicken sandwich. The sauces overshadowed the few flavors the food had. Even though I asked for little sauce on it, the lady gave me a lot.

Price: I think their prices are somewhat okay. I mean the quality and flavors of the food is okay, nothing exciting. However, personally, the factors mentioned above do not convince me to be a regular customer.

This is possibly the best all-day halal restaurant. The seasoning on all of the food is just what native New Yorkers need and want from a eatery that serves ‚Äújust looking for a quick bite and I need it to be delicious-regardless of how unhealthy it is.‚Äù

Obviously there are healthy options: the salads are great and they do grill their protein as well.

The establishment is clean and the tables are also inviting. Lighting is bright and it feels like an oasis in the dark Queens Center Mall area.

The service is also quick.

All of the workers are super professional and kind.

Overall a 5 star experience. This is my fourth time eating here in a month and the experience is always consistent.

I love the food it‚Äôs tasty and delicious. Great service & excellent staff. Only thing is that there‚Äôs only enough sitting for 20 people. This does not stop people from taking out food. I always like to eat in.  I love this place 5 stars for me üòä

I have ate chicken over rice in over 50 places in NYC. This is definitely in my top 3. Fresh food, salad, fries. The chicken is seasoned so well, not too bland, not too spicy. They may have a slight higher price than your average cart but they include seasoned fries and their portion is at least 40% more than your average from a cart. Also a very clean and peaceful atmosphere. The staff are extremely kind, professional and thoughtful. Loved the food and don't forget to try the green sauce! Will definitely come back here with friends and family and would 100% recommend you stop by this place as well!!
Impressed with the flavor!!! Better than most halal carts on the streets. The hot sauce and white sauce stands out in my taste buds. Delicious!

Discovered this place on Instagram and didn‚Äôt realize it was right next to the White Castle near Queens Center Mall.   The food was great, the restaurant was clean, and the person who helped me was super friendly and even gave me a free drink.   Will definitely return because this is a hidden gem.   Went back and ordered the garlic chicken wings‚Ä¶had to wait 10 mins bc they were freshly prepared‚Ä¶.and 10/10 delicious!!!
Price is unbeatable for the portion! And they even give you extra sauce! Tastes amazing too!

Happened to be nearby at the time with cravings and decided on halal after seeing this location. No parking available directly at the restaurant but was able to get one nearby on a quiet, early midday. Restaurant was very clean with a modern and appealing design. Staff was friendly and service was good. Food was very delicious. Platter is comparable (based on the pri¬¢e$) to most other halal restaurants/carts but this included seasoned fries with it, which is a bonus for myself and others. Chicken and lamb were flavorful, juicy, and tender. Gyro and sandwiches were also delicious. Was not disappointed with this one.

My mom comes here every Friday and the food is absolutely incredible! No matter what you order - The food is always fresh, flavorful, and seasoned to perfection. The Chapli kebab, Mixed platter & Loaded Fries are our favorites.

You can tell the owners TRULY care about quality and service. The staff is always warm and attentive, asking for feedback without being overbearing.

Prices are VERY fair for the quality of food and calling the  portions "generous" is an understatement. You can really tell this restaurant puts heart into everything they do. Highly recommend!

Forget what you know about fast food because this place isn‚Äôt your typical fast food joint. The nighttime manager will personally make you one of the best meals you can get at a fast food restaurant. The staff is knowledgeable and the customization options are limitless. I got the cheeseburger and the Honey Garlic Lemon Pepper boneless wings and that‚Äôs a sauce you can only get at this place. If you want great food at great prices, this is the place to go.

First time here today and ordered chicken platter and lamb chicken platter and it was ok. In the beginning the food tasted good until I got to the bottom of my rice and it had a sour taste to it, maybe because they had salad in the same tray. So when I eat my halal I like it with white sauce, bbq sauce and a tad bit spicy. Hence their spicy sauce is SPICY! Be sure to get a drink prepared and ready to take down the spicy.

So this platter all comes with salad, rice, and seasoned fries. The portions are pretty big! Place was pretty small so it‚Äôs like playing musical chairs trying to find a seat. Wait is a bit longer because they seem to be pretty busy.

Overall food was good. I recommend trying it with white sauce and bbq sauce!

Best Gyro spot in NYC right i feel. Their chicken or over rice even with Lamb is amazing. They really put effort in serving their customers. The seating area might be compact and limited but its great to take out or order online

Halal Grill Eats is an absolute gem! The Bacon Burger is hands down one of the best I‚Äôve ever had‚Äîjuicy, flavorful, and perfectly cooked. The halal bacon adds such a delicious twist, and the fresh ingredients take it to the next level. The staff is super friendly, and the service is quick without compromising quality. Whether you‚Äôre dining in or grabbing takeout, this spot is a must-visit for burger lovers. Highly recommend!

I'm so glad I stopped by to pickup my dinner here. I was pleasantly surprised, not too spicy but a lovely blend of flavors that waked up my taste buds. I had to personally thank the chef, he definitely added some love. The staff is very welcoming. I'll definitely stop by again.
Cheers

They have the best Mediterranean food in Queens. The chicken over rice and other dishes are always fresh and delicious. The employees are amazing‚Äîalways friendly and welcoming, with service that goes above and beyond.

Halal Grill Eats is hands down one of my favorite spots in Queens! Every time I go, I‚Äôm blown away by how good the food is. Their platters are super filling ‚Äì the chicken and lamb mix is packed with flavor, and the Chapli kebab is perfectly‚Ä¶

Good looking platter but the taste did not suffice. Chicken was terrible; lamb was decent. The rice was bland but the salad/fries were good. The sauce as well had zero flavor. They have a sign saying paying in cash is better and they don‚Äôt charge tax but it‚Äôs incorrect, they in fact do.

Second time coming here, the staff is super nice and kind, they are very engaging and asking people if they enjoy the food. We ordered one lamb platter and one chicken platter, the chicken was tasty and not dry, I loved the fries !! will visit again. One con is the size of the place, its small but otherwise 5/5.
Definitely got food poisoning from eating here. Worst feeling on the planet. Never eating here again.

Order Details:

Dish: Fish Platter

Ordered via: DoorDash

Food Quality:
The fish platter from Halal Eats on Queens Blvd is an absolute delight. From the moment you open the packaging, the enticing aroma of freshly prepared fish wafts up, promising a flavorful meal. The fish itself is perfectly cooked‚Äîcrispy on the outside and tender on the inside. It's seasoned with a blend of spices that enhances the natural flavor of the fish without overpowering it. The accompanying rice is fluffy and fragrant, a perfect base that complements the fish wonderfully.

Taste:
One of the standout features of this dish is its taste. The fish is succulent and moist, with a crispy coating that adds a delightful texture to each bite. The seasoning strikes a perfect balance, providing a burst of flavor that‚Äôs neither too mild nor too overpowering. The accompanying side dishes, including fresh salad and creamy sauce, add a refreshing contrast and additional layers of flavor. Each component of the platter works in harmony, creating a well-rounded and satisfying meal.

Portion Size:
The portion size is generous, ensuring you get good value for your money. The fish platter is more than sufficient for a hearty meal, with enough food to leave you feeling fully satisfied. In fact, the portion is so ample that it‚Äôs likely you‚Äôll have leftovers, which brings us to another noteworthy point.

Leftover Quality:
A unique highlight of the fish platter from Halal Eats is that it tastes even better the next day. The flavors seem to meld and intensify overnight, making the leftovers a treat in their own right. Reheating the fish doesn‚Äôt compromise its crispy texture, and the rice remains fluffy and flavorful. It‚Äôs rare to find a dish that maintains, or even enhances, its quality as leftovers, but this fish platter certainly does.

Delivery Experience:
Ordering through DoorDash was smooth and convenient. The food arrived on time, still hot and fresh, which is crucial for enjoying the fish at its best. The packaging was secure, ensuring that the meal wasn‚Äôt disrupted during transit.

Overall Experience:
Halal Eats on Queens Blvd delivers an exceptional dining experience with their fish platter. The combination of expertly cooked fish, flavorful rice, and fresh side dishes makes for a memorable meal. The generous portions and the fact that leftovers taste even better the next day add extra value and satisfaction. Whether you‚Äôre ordering in for a quick meal or planning to enjoy leftovers later, the fish platter from Halal Eats is a fantastic choice.

If you're looking for a delicious and satisfying meal, Halal Eats on Queens Blvd is highly recommended. Their fish platter is a standout dish that is sure to please your taste buds both fresh and as leftovers.
The people are so nice and the food is AWESOME!!!!! We finished the whole platter and they even gave extra soda!!!

I enjoy the tasty Chai tea with my friend Justin and Reymark. One of the best halal food in the area. Really friendly people and we got along with one of the server name Karim. They got few tables for people and also a standing side table for individuals. The atmosphere is good but lighting may need some alternative. Regardless, I am glad they are open til late night as me and my friends needed to get a good tea and a good food this is the place to go to!

We had a chicken platter, a spicy chicken sandwich, and buffalo wings at Halal Eats on Queens Blvd. We were served by Kainat, who was exceptionally kind and made great suggestions with our orders. We thoroughly enjoyed our lunch.

Their lamb gyros are soooo good. The staff is friendly, especially the lady with the thick Indian accent that usually handles the orders. You wait maybe 5-10 minutes and it's done, very quick. I love this place, but only reason why I'm giving it 4 stars instead of 5 is because I've already gained 3 pounds from eating here so often and i'm salty about that

100% Halal Certificate with authentic food, full of favors, vibrant colors, a must try for anyone with zero spice tolerance to zesty fired up taste buds üî• is truly meets the expectations
‚≠êÔ∏è ‚≠êÔ∏è ‚≠êÔ∏è ‚≠êÔ∏è ‚≠êÔ∏è

I‚Äôm so OBSESSED with the Mixed Chapli Platter, absolutely delicious - fresh, flavorful and perfectly cooked with a generous amount of food for the üí∞You can really taste the quality in every bites

Let‚Äôs talk about the REAL STAR - Loaded Fries üçü is not an average fries, THIS IS SO CRAZT - Chicken & Bacon ü•ì I‚Äôm still dreaming about it now.
Honey Garlic Lemon Pepper Wings has a cleaner & fresh taste, simple delicious, I‚Äôm so satisfied with the texture.

They have the best halal food around!!! The food is always fresh and consistent which is amazing. They add fries which nobody does anymore. Just look at the food üò© 10/10 every time and the staff is always very welcoming and kind.
Best lamb gyro around from queen to time square. They dont skimp on anything. When your there your fam.

I was not ready for this experience. The Honey Garlic Lemon Pepper wings is a dish made for royalty. The staff treat you like family. It got me ready to start moving to Queens (not really but I thought about it).

The two pictures are two days apart and are supposed to be for the same order (10 pieces of hot wings). Paying $50 for lunch and coming home to see you have salty dry fried dry wings for dinner instead of actual hot wings dripping with hot sauce.
Make sure to check what is packed before taking it home!

After living in NYC for almost 30 years, I can say without a doubt that this is the best Halal restaurant in NYC. Everything on the menu is delicious. The staff who work there are super friendly and maintain the place very clean. Glad to have found this restaurant.
